scripts.start: npm run start:js & npm run start:css
scripts.start:js: cp src/js/qrious.min.js assets/js/qrious.min.js && wp-scripts start src/js/rrze-qr.js --output-path=assets/js --output-filename=rrze-qr.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run increment-version
scripts.build:js: wp-scripts build src/js/rrze-qr.js --output-path=assets/js --output-filename=rrze-qr.min.js && cp src/js/qrious.min.js assets/js/qrious.min.js
